description:
Generate a fixel-fixel connectivity matrix.

This command will generate a directory containing three images, which encodes the fixel-fixel connectivity matrix. Documentation regarding this format and how to use it will come in the future.

References:

threshold.title: threshold
threshold.description: a threshold to define the required fraction of shared connections to be included in the neighbourhood (default: 0.01)

angle.title: angle
angle.description: the max angle threshold for assigning streamline tangents to fixels (Default: 45 degrees)

mask.title: mask
mask.description: provide a fixel data file containing a mask of those fixels to be computed; fixels outside the mask will be empty in the output matrix

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).
